by X Factor judge Simon Cowell . The actress told The Sun that she thinks her alter-ego, famous for her cutting put-downs, would make a great panellist on the TV talent show. She said: I think Sue Sylvester has British in her. I think the US look at the British as a race that tells it how it is." And if ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell . You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her." He's a great inspiration for the character of Sue- there is a lot that I can take from him and put into her.
